au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=12m_L2=12m_central
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(11200,0) # Drive guide to g3 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g3) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g3) sics.drive('apx', -47) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(261)
